biolockj.util

Class SeqUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.SeqUtil

  • public class SeqUtil
extends Object
    This utility helps interact with FastA and FastQ sequence files.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FASTA
      File extension for fasta files = .fasta
      static String FASTA_HEADER_DEFAULT_DELIM
      Default 1st character for a FASTA file: "greater-than-sign"
      static List<String> FASTA_HEADER_DELIMS
      List of acceptable 1st characters for a FASTA file
      static String FASTQ
      File extension for fastq files: "fastq"
      static String FASTQ_HEADER_DELIM
      Only acceptable 1st character for a FASTQ file: "@"
      static String ILLUMINA_FW_READ_IND
      Illumina forward read indicator found in sequence header
      static String ILLUMINA_RV_READ_IND
      Illumina reverse read indicator found in sequence header
      static String INTERNAL_SEQ_HEADER_CHAR
      Config property: "internal.seqHeaderChar"
      The property holds the 1st character used in the sequence header for the given dataset
      static String INTERNAL_SEQ_TYPE
      Config property: "internal.seqType"
      The sequence type path will save either "fasta" or "fastq" to Config using this property.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void copyInputData()
      Create a copy of the sequence files in property "input.dirPaths", output to a directory named "internal.pipelineDir"/input.
      static long countNumReads(File seqFile)
      Method counts number of reads in the given sequence file by counting the number of lines and dividing by the number of lines/sample (fasta=2, fastq=4)
      static BufferedReader getFileReader(File file)
      Get a BufferedReader for standard text file or GZIPInputStream for gzipped files ending in ".gz"
      static String getHeader(String line)
      Extract the header from the first line of a read (parse to first space).
      static Set<String> getHeaders(File seq)
      Return the header of each read in the sequence file.
      static Set<String> getHeaders(File fwRead, File rvRead)
      Get valid headers found in both forward and reverse read.
      static List<File> getInputDirs()
      Get the list of input directories for the pipeline.
      static String getInputSequenceType()
      Determine if seqs are fasta or fastq by checking input file format (check 1st character only).
      static int getNumLinesPerRead()
      Return number of lines per read (for fasta return 2, for fastq return 4)
      static long getNumReads(long numLines)
      Return number of reads given number of lines in a sample.
      static Map<File,File> getPairedReads(Collection<File> files)
      Paired reads must have a unique file suffix to identify forward and reverse reads.
      static List<File> getPipelineInputFiles()
      Recursively get files located in the directories listed in Config."input.dirPaths" after removing Config."input.ignoreFiles"
      static String getSampleId(String value)
      Method extracts Sample ID from the name param.
      static List<String> getSeqHeaderChars()
      Get all sequence header characters for fasta and fastq files.
      static void initialize()
      Initialize Config params set by SeqUtil.
      protected static void initIgnoreFiles()
      Set Config.INPUT_IGNORE_FILES: Ignore the metadata file Config."metadata.filePath" If Config pipeline contains biolockj.module.seq or biolockj.module.classifier BioModules, ignore non-(fasta/fastq) files found in Config.INPUT_DIRS
      static boolean isFastA()
      Return TRUE if input files are in FastA format.
      static boolean isFastQ()
      Return TRUE if input files are in FastQ format.
      static boolean isForwardRead(String name)
      Return TRUE if reads are unpaired or if name does not contain the reverse read file suffix: "input.suffixRv"
      static String reverseComplement(String dna)
      Return the DNA reverse compliment for the input dna parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • copyInputData

        public static void copyInputData()
                          throws Exception
        Create a copy of the sequence files in property "input.dirPaths", output to a directory named "internal.pipelineDir"/input.
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to copy the files

      • countNumReads

        public static long countNumReads(File seqFile)
                          throws Exception
        Method counts number of reads in the given sequence file by counting the number of lines and dividing by the number of lines/sample (fasta=2, fastq=4)
        Parameters:
        seqFile - Sequence file
        Returns:
        Number of reads in seqFile
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getFileReader

        public static BufferedReader getFileReader(File file)
                                    throws FileNotFoundException,
                                           IOException
        Get a BufferedReader for standard text file or GZIPInputStream for gzipped files ending in ".gz"
        Parameters:
        file - to be read
        Returns:
        BufferedReader or GZIPInputStream if file is gzipped
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if file does not exist
        IOException - if unable to read or write the file

      • getHeader

        public static String getHeader(String line)
        Extract the header from the first line of a read (parse to first space). This part of the header line will be identical on forward and reverse reads, so can be used to find matching pairs of reads.

        To extract the header, trim to the Illumina read direction indicator, if it exists, otherwise to the 1st space. Method recognizes the headers: " 1:N:" and " 2:N:"

        Parameters:
        line - Sequence line
        Returns:
        Sequence header

      • getHeaders

        public static Set<String> getHeaders(File seq)
                              throws Exception
        Return the header of each read in the sequence file.
        Parameters:
        seq - Fasta or Fastq file
        Returns:
        Set of sequence headers
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to parse the seq file

      • getHeaders

        public static Set<String> getHeaders(File fwRead,
                                     File rvRead)
                              throws Exception
        Get valid headers found in both forward and reverse read.
        Parameters:
        fwRead - Forward read sequence file
        rvRead - Reverse read sequence file
        Returns:
        Sequence headers found in both files
        Throws:
        Exception - if I/O errors occur

      • getInputDirs

        public static List<File> getInputDirs()
                               throws Exception
        Get the list of input directories for the pipeline.
        Returns:
        List of system directory file paths
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getInputSequenceType

        public static String getInputSequenceType()
                                   throws Exception
        Determine if seqs are fasta or fastq by checking input file format (check 1st character only).
        Returns:
        "fasta" or "fastq"
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine sequence type

      • getNumLinesPerRead

        public static int getNumLinesPerRead()
                              throws Exception
        Return number of lines per read (for fasta return 2, for fastq return 4)
        Returns:
        2 or 4
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine sequence format

      • getNumReads

        public static long getNumReads(long numLines)
                        throws Exception
        Return number of reads given number of lines in a sample.
        Parameters:
        numLines - Total number of lines in sample
        Returns:
        Number of reads
        Throws:
        Exception - if number of reads cannot be determined

      • getPairedReads

        public static Map<File,File> getPairedReads(Collection<File> files)
                                     throws Exception
        Paired reads must have a unique file suffix to identify forward and reverse reads. Parameter files read and a map with forward read file names as keys and matching reverse reads as the map return value
        Parameters:
        files - List of paired read files
        Returns:
        Map with key=fwRead and val=rvRead
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to find paired reads

      • getPipelineInputFiles

        public static List<File> getPipelineInputFiles()
                                        throws Exception
        Recursively get files located in the directories listed in Config."input.dirPaths" after removing Config."input.ignoreFiles"
        Returns:
        Pipeline input files
        Throws:
        Exception - if no input files are found

      • getSampleId

        public static String getSampleId(String value)
                          throws Exception
        Method extracts Sample ID from the name param. Possibly input is a file name so remove file extensions. If demultiplexing (RDP/Kraken support this option), input is a sequence header
        Parameters:
        value - File name or sequence header
        Returns:
        Sample ID
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine Sample ID

      • getSeqHeaderChars

        public static final List<String> getSeqHeaderChars()
                                            throws Exception
        Get all sequence header characters for fasta and fastq files.
        Returns:
        List of sequence header 1st character options
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine sequence type

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
                       throws Exception
        Initialize Config params set by SeqUtil.
        Throws:
        Exception - if runtime errors occur

      • isFastA

        public static boolean isFastA()
                       throws Exception
        Return TRUE if input files are in FastA format.
        Returns:
        TRUE if input files are in FastA format
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine sequence type

      • isFastQ

        public static boolean isFastQ()
                       throws Exception
        Return TRUE if input files are in FastQ format.
        Returns:
        TRUE if input files are in FastQ format
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to determine sequence type

      • isForwardRead

        public static boolean isForwardRead(String name)
                             throws Exception
        Return TRUE if reads are unpaired or if name does not contain the reverse read file suffix: "input.suffixRv"
        Parameters:
        name - Name of file
        Returns:
        TRUE for unpaired or forward reads
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config properties are missing or invalid

      • reverseComplement

        public static String reverseComplement(String dna)
                                throws Exception
        Return the DNA reverse compliment for the input dna parameter.
        Parameters:
        dna - DNA base sequence
        Returns:
        DNA reverse complement
        Throws:
        Exception - if sequence contains a non-standard letter (only ACGT accepted)

      • initIgnoreFiles

        protected static void initIgnoreFiles()
                               throws Exception
        Set Config.INPUT_IGNORE_FILES:
        • Ignore the metadata file Config."metadata.filePath"
        • If Config pipeline contains biolockj.module.seq or biolockj.module.classifier BioModules, ignore non-(fasta/fastq) files found in Config.INPUT_DIRS
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config.INPUT_DIRS undefined or file reader I/O Exception occurs
